statements: SELECT * FROM satellite_communications ORDER BY band_name DESC, frequency_id ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT satellite_id, band_name FROM satellite_communications WHERE bandwidth_allocation > 100
SELECT * FROM satellite_communications WHERE satellite_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT frequency_id, satellite_id, band_name, bandwidth_allocation FROM satellite_communications ORDER BY bandwidth_allocation DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT band_name, COUNT(*) as total_satellites FROM satellite_communications GROUP BY band_name
SELECT * FROM satellite_communications WHERE satellite_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT frequency_id, band_name FROM satellite_communications WHERE bandwidth_allocation > 100
SELECT satellite_id, band_name FROM satellite_communications WHERE bandwidth_allocation BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT * FROM satellite_communications ORDER BY band_name ASC, frequency_id DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM satellite_communications
SELECT * FROM satellite_communication;
SELECT satellite_id, frequency FROM satellite_communication WHERE frequency > 10;
SELECT satellite_id, bandwidth FROM satellite_communication ORDER BY bandwidth DESC;
SELECT * FROM bandwidth_allocation WHERE start_time >= '2022-01-01' AND end_time <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT allocation_id, satellite_id, allocated_bandwidth FROM bandwidth_allocation ORDER BY allocated_bandwidth ASC;
SELECT * FROM satellite_communication WHERE frequency > 100 AND bandwidth < 50;
SELECT satellite_id, frequency FROM satellite_communication WHERE frequency BETWEEN 80 AND 120;
SELECT * FROM bandwidth_allocation WHERE allocated_bandwidth > 75 ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT satellite_id, start_time, end_time FROM bandwidth_allocation WHERE allocated_bandwidth = 100 AND satellite_id = 3;
SELECT sum(allocated_bandwidth) as total_bandwidth FROM bandwidth_allocation GROUP BY satellite_id HAVING total_bandwidth > 200;
SELECT * FROM satellite_comms;
SELECT satellite_name, frequency_band FROM satellite_comms WHERE bandwidth_allocations > 1000;
SELECT band_name FROM frequency_band WHERE band_id = 3;
SELECT satellite_name, band_name FROM satellite_comms JOIN frequency_band ON satellite_comms.frequency_band = frequency_band.band_name;
SELECT * FROM bandwidth_allocations WHERE allocation_start > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM satellite_comms WHERE satellite_name = 'Satellite-A';
SELECT satellite_name, frequency_band FROM satellite_comms WHERE bandwidth_allocations > 1000;
SELECT * FROM satellite_comms WHERE satellite_name LIKE '%Satellite%';
SELECT band_name FROM frequency_band ORDER BY band_id DESC;

SELECT satellite_name, allocation_start, allocation_end FROM satellite_comms INNER JOIN bandwidth_allocations ON satellite_comms.id = bandwidth_allocations.satellite_id WHERE allocation_start >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM satellite_communications;
SELECT satellite_name, frequency_band FROM satellite_communications ORDER BY satellite_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM frequency_bands WHERE band_name='Ku Band';
SELECT satellite_name, bandwidth_allocation FROM satellite_communications WHERE bandwidth_allocation > 1500;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM satellite_communications WHERE satellite_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT satellite_name, bandwidth_allocation FROM satellite_communications WHERE frequency_band = 'X Band' ORDER BY satellite_name DESC

SELECT satellite_name, band_name, start_time, end_time FROM satellite_communications JOIN bandwidth_allocations ON satellite_communications.satellite_id = bandwidth_allocations.satellite_id JOIN frequency_bands ON bandwidth_allocations.band_id = frequency_bands.band_id
SELECT * FROM satellite_communications WHERE satellite_name LIKE '%Sat%' AND bandwidth_allocation > 1000
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie')
SELECT * FROM Satellites;
SELECT satellite_name, launch_date FROM Satellites;
SELECT communication_id, frequency, bandwidth FROM Communication WHERE frequency > 1000;
SELECT satellite_name, launch_date FROM Satellites ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM GroundStations WHERE location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT * FROM Satellites ORDER BY launch_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT satellite_name, launch_date FROM Satellites WHERE launch_date > '2022-01-01'

SELECT Communication.satellite_id, frequency, bandwidth FROM Communication JOIN BandwidthAllocations ON Communication.communication_id = BandwidthAllocations.communication_id WHERE BandwidthAllocations.start_timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT station_name, location FROM GroundStations WHERE location LIKE '%USA%'
SELECT * FROM FrequencyRanges WHERE min_frequency < 100 AND max_frequency > 500
